data.text: God, you who are greater than all other gods,
You will answer me from heaven and rescue me,
Sometimes I am surrounded by my enemies who are like lions that kill humans;
God, show in the heavens that you are very great!
It is as if [MET, HYP] my enemies spread a net to seize me,
God, I have complete confidence [DOU] in you.
Lord, I will thank you among all the people;
because your faithful love for us is as great as the distance from the earth to the sky,
God, show in the heavens that you are very great!
